verses.verse: Now <S%H428>these<s%> are [the records of] the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> and <S%H3315>Japheth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah;<s%> and <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to them <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3315>Japheth<s%> [were] <S%H1586>Gomer<s%> and <S%H4031>Magog<s%> and <S%H4074>Madai<s%> and <S%H3120>Javan<s%> and <S%H8422>Tubal<s%> and <S%H4902>Meshech<s%> and <S%H8494>Tiras.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1586>Gomer<s%> [were] <S%H813>Ashkenaz<s%> and <S%H7384>Riphath<s%> and <S%H8425>Togarmah.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3120>Javan<s%> [were] <S%H473>Elishah<s%> and <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> <S%H3794>Kittim<s%> and <S%H1721>Dodanim.<s%>

From <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> were <S%H6504>separated<s%> into their <S%H776>lands,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H3956>language,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> into their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham<s%> [were] <S%H3568>Cush<s%> and <S%H4714>Mizraim<s%> and <S%H6316>Put<s%> and <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush<s%> [were] <S%H5434>Seba<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah<s%> and <S%H5454>Sabtah<s%> and <S%H7484>Raamah<s%> and <S%H5455>Sabteca;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah<s%> [were] <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>
Now <S%H3568>Cush<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod;<s%> he <S%H2490>became<s%> <S%H1961><s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>one<s%> on the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

He was a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it is <S%H559>said,<s%> "Like <S%H5248>Nimrod<s%> a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H6718>hunter<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"
And the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> was <S%H894>Babel<s%> and <S%H751>Erech<s%> and <S%H390>Accad<s%> and <S%H3641>Calneh,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar.<s%>
From that <S%H776>land<s%> he <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> and Rehoboth-Ir and <S%H3625>Calah,<s%>
and <S%H7449>Resen<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> and <S%H3625>Calah;<s%> that is the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>
And <S%H4714>Mizraim<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3866>Ludim<s%> and <S%H6047>Anamim<s%> and <S%H3853>Lehabim<s%> and <S%H5320>Naphtuhim<s%>
and <S%H6625>Pathrusim<s%> and <S%H3695>Casluhim<s%> (from <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%>) and <S%H3732>Caphtorim.<s%>
And <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> his first-born, and <S%H2845>Heth<s%>
and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite<s%>
and the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H6208>Arkite<s%> and the <S%H5513>Sinite<s%>

and the <S%H721>Arvadite<s%> and the <S%H6786>Zemarite<s%> and the <S%H2577>Hamathite;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> were <S%H6327>spread<s%> abroad.

And the <S%H1366>territory<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> <S%H1961>extended<s%> from <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H1642>Gerar,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> and <S%H126>Admah<s%> and <S%H6636>Zeboiim,<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as <S%H3962>Lasha.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> according to their <S%H3956>languages,<s%> by their <S%H776>lands,<s%> by their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> the father of <S%H1>all<s%> the <S%H3605>children<s%> of <S%H1121>Eber,<s%> [and] the <S%H5677>older<s%> <S%H1419>brother<s%> of <S%H251>Japheth,<s%> children were <S%H3315>born.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem<s%> [were] <S%H5867>Elam<s%> and <S%H804>Asshur<s%> and <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> and <S%H3865>Lud<s%> and <S%H758>Aram.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H758>Aram<s%> [were] <S%H5780>Uz<s%> and <S%H2343>Hul<s%> and <S%H1666>Gether<s%> and <S%H4851>Mash.<s%>
And <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah;<s%> and <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber.<s%>

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H5677>Eber;<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> [was] <S%H6389>Peleg,<s%> for in his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H6385>divided;<s%> and his brother's <S%H8034>name<s%> [was] <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
And <S%H3355>Joktan<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H486>Almodad<s%> and <S%H8026>Sheleph<s%> and <S%H2700>Hazarmaveth<s%> and <S%H3392>Jerah<s%>
and <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%> and <S%H187>Uzal<s%> and <S%H1853>Diklah<s%>
and <S%H5745>Obal<s%> and <S%H39>Abimael<s%> and <S%H7614>Sheba<s%>
and <S%H211>Ophir<s%> and <S%H2341>Havilah<s%> and <S%H3103>Jobab;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
Now their <S%H4186>settlement<s%> <S%H1961>extended<s%> from <S%H4852>Mesha<s%> as you <S%H935>go<s%> toward <S%H5611>Sephar,<s%> the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> of the <S%H6924>east.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8035>Shem,<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families,<s%> according to their <S%H3956>languages,<s%> by their <S%H776>lands,<s%> according to their <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah,<s%> according to their <S%H8435>genealogies,<s%> by their <S%H1471>nations;<s%> and out of <S%H428>these<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> were <S%H6504>separated<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H3999>flood.<s%>
